name: mergeable
description: Mergeable is a self-hosted change request and merge management system for Git repositories. It allows teams to manage merge requests with approval workflows and integrates with Git servers.

features.title: Merge Request Management
features.description: Track and review code changes with pull request workflows

features.title: Approval Workflows
features.description: Configure required approvals before merges can be completed

features.title: Git Integration
features.description: Connect to Git servers like GitLab, Gitea, or GitHub for repository access

features.title: Code Review Tools
features.description: Comment on specific lines, suggest changes, and discuss modifications

features.title: Status Checks
features.description: Integrate with CI/CD pipelines to require passing tests before merge

features.title: Branch Protection
features.description: Enforce rules like required reviews or status checks on protected branches

features.title: Conflict Detection
features.description: Identify merge conflicts and provide tools for resolution

features.title: Activity Tracking
features.description: View history of comments, approvals, and changes on each merge request
